page.title: 05Wasps Nest
page.content: Wasps Nest is a hamlet to the North East of Dunston.The shortest route using roads or tracks from Wasps Nest to Dunston is two & a half km.There are 23 people who live at Wasps Nest. There are 7 houses at Wasps Nest one is vacant and 5 of the houses are in a row.The other 2 are down a separate road.They are all brick built.The game keeper lives in 1 house. There is supposedly a ghost of a nun in Mrs Ward's house.One day one of her friends,who was psychic came to stay for the weekend.Every time he looked at Mrs Ward he saw the nun standing next to her. Up on the hill behind the row of houses there used to be an abbey.There supposedly was a smugglers tunnel from Nocton Hall to the abbey.
